sentence.Network_en: Month - long sea - by the public voted online, Preliminary results will be announced in mid - November.
sentence.Network_cn: 为期 一个月的海选由网友公开投票评选, 初评结果将在11月 中旬 公布.

sentence.Network_en: Troops were sent to the islands to restore order last November.
sentence.Network_cn: 去年11月，军队被派往这些岛屿以恢复秩序。

sentence.Network_en: He was bailed to appear before local magistrates on 5 November.
sentence.Network_cn: 他获得保释，将于11月5日在地方法庭出庭受审。

auth_sentence.content: Most motorway repairs are schemed to end by mid-November.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most motorway repairs are schemed to end by mid-November.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most motorway repairs are schemed to end by mid-November.

auth_sentence.content: BCC's usually develop in mid to late life.
auth_sentence.res_content: BCC's usually develop in mid to late life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BCC's usually develop in mid to late life.

auth_sentence.content: Teary, mid-paced pleas for a lover's forgiveness.
